eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Georgia; AT 03:41 PM ON NOV 19, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 04:41 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: From the Georgia Emergency Management Agency, and the Georgia Office of Homeland Security this is the required monthly test of the Emergency Alert system.
